value.title: Dealing with orphaned Power BI workspaces
value.excerpt: What are orphaned Power BI Workspaces and how do you get rid of them? What if you have a lot of them? Adam walks through some options including a PowerShell script! value.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)
